name: Jukebox Synesthesia
description:
Dodge the visual sounds in this colorful Bullet Hell!

Instructions:
WASD / Arrows / Left Stick to Move
Z / A button to Dash (short time invincibility)
ESC / B Button to Quit

Design + Music: @pengwndude
Code + Extra Design: @Deaymon

Note: New version with some little fixes.
